data.name: asFirstStep
data.value:
As first step, ensure the transaction is completed in PayPal. Login to your PayPal account, find the transaction for Realm of Empires, and ensure the status is 'Completed'.

If the transaction is completed, or for other paypal transaction related problems, please

data.name: contactSupport
data.value: Contacting Support

data.name: firstContactOfferComp
data.value:
(like OfferPal or SuperRewards), either by completing offers or buying servants using other methods these 3rd parties provide, you must first contact the offer company.

To do so,

data.name: noteActionMayResult
data.value: Note! Abuse of this system, ie, reporting little things in order to damage a player, will be considered a serious offense and may result in action taken against you.

data.name: noteNotProperWay
data.value: Please note that this is not a proper way to make a suggestion or ask a game-play related question. We will not respond to such queries.

data.name: OTHERTHAN
data.value:
OTHER THAN PERSONAL INSULTS, please see I want to report a serious abuse by a player above.

For suspected cheating or other Terms of Use abuse, please

data.name: please
data.value: Please

data.name: pleaseLetUsKnow
data.value: please let us know. NOTE that in-game threats and comments on your game play ability are not considered abuse. For more explanation of what we consider abuse, see

data.name: pleaseNote
data.value:
Please note! In case of abuse or profanity or such, only report abuse if you are seriously offended! This is a game of conflict and emotions sometimes run high. We will only deal with serious cases of abuse.

If the nature of the abuse is excessive profanity or insults, you must wait and report the case to us 24 hours AFTER the occurance of the abuse. We will not take action on any reports sent earlier since in most of the cases, emotions subside, and involved parties make amends without the 'big brother' getting involved - everybody wins.

For abuse on clan forums, first contact clan administrators. We will typically not police clan forums since the clan administrators have the power of silencing such people. We will deal with serious cases such as real-life threats.

Also, note that you can block a person from being able to send you in-game messages. Open a message from the person you want to block and click the "Block Person" link. This is the easiest and quickest method of silencing the abuser.

data.name: pleaseNoteNotProper
data.value: Please note that this is not a proper way to make a suggestion or ask a game-play related question. We will not respond to such queries.

data.name: pleaseUse
data.value: Please use the guide below to find out how to contact us in your situation.

data.name: link_postOnForumInstead
data.value: Post on the forum instead

data.name: selectATab
data.value:
select a tab for the company in question, and find and click a "Missing Servants?/View Offer Status" link.

Keep a record of your case and

data.name: weMonitorForum
data.value:
We monitor the forum regularly and, in most cases, you will receive immediate help from other players.

Do not contact support in other ways for such questions. Posting on the forum is the only appropriate way to ask game related questions.

data.name: weMonitorForums
data.value:
We monitor the forum regularly and either staff or perhaps other players may be able to help you.

If the inquiry is not appropriate for the forum, then
